URGENT! My family is trapped in Atat√ºrk apartment, 4th floor, block C in Antakya center. We can hear them calling. PLEASE SEND HELP! #deprem #Antakya
My cousin and her 3 children are under rubble in Jandaris, Al-Shifa building near the mosque. No rescue teams reached yet. PLEASE HELP #Syria #earthquake
Just pulled out a 7 year old girl alive from debris in Kahramanmara≈ü after 28 hours. She's asking for her mother. Teams still searching. #TurkeyQuake
Aleppo is destroyed again. We survived the war only to face this. Building collapsed on my street, 15 families trapped. Where is the help? #Aleppo #SyriaEarthquake
Search and rescue operations ongoing in Gaziantep. If you know someone trapped, share exact location with coordinates. Every second counts. #TurkeyEarthquake

In Adƒ±yaman now. The devastation is beyond words. Entire neighborhoods are gone. We need more hands, more equipment, more time. #Adƒ±yamanEarthquake
Sending supplies from Ankara to affected areas. If anyone needs specific items (baby formula, medicine, blankets) please list below. We'll try to help. #TurkeyStrong
Working in makeshift hospital in Idlib. Overwhelmed with casualties. Need medical supplies urgently - antibiotics, painkillers, surgical equipment. #SyriaEarthquake #Help
Walking through Antakya feels like a war zone. Buildings leaning at impossible angles. Rescue dogs everywhere. People digging with bare hands. This is catastrophic. #TurkeySyriaEarthquake
My school in Malatya is now a shelter for 200 people. We need tents, food, warm clothes. Temperatures dropping at night. Children are traumatized and cold. #Malatya #deprem
Been operating non-stop for 36 hours. So many crush injuries. Running out of blood supplies. Type O negative desperately needed in Gaziantep hospitals. #BloodDonation #TurkeyQuake

Coordinating relief efforts across border. Syria side severely underequipped. International community must act now. Thousands still buried. #SyriaCrisis #TurkeyEarthquake
Structural engineer here. DO NOT enter damaged buildings. Aftershocks continue. Wait for professionals. Already seen too many secondary casualties. #SafetyFirst #deprem
3 days without news from my daughter in Hatay. Last known location: Armutlu neighborhood, Yeni Hayat residences. She was on 2nd floor. Please if anyone has info üôè #FindMySon #Hatay
Mobile hospitals deployed in Kahramanmara≈ü, Hatay, and Gaziantep. Treating hundreds daily. Blood donation centers open 24/7. Please donate if you can. #Kƒ±zƒ±lAy #TurkeyRelief
Drove 12 hours from Istanbul with supplies. Now in Adƒ±yaman helping distribute food and water. So many children alone, looking for parents. Heartbreaking. #VolunteerTurkey
Death toll in Syria climbing. Regime areas and rebel-held territories both devastated. Political differences must be set aside for rescue operations. #SyriaUnited #Earthquake
WE FOUND HER! Woman rescued after 72 hours in Iskenderun! Never give up hope. Teams working around the clock in impossible conditions. #Miracle #Iskenderun
Refugee camps in northern Syria completely destroyed by quake. People who already lost everything now homeless again. Where do we go? #SyrianRefugees #Earthquake
Volunteers needed who speak Arabic, Turkish, English, Kurdish for coordination between rescue teams and victims. Contact local emergency centers. #Translators #HelpNeeded
Rescuing trapped animals too. Found 3 dogs and 2 cats alive in collapsed building in Antakya. If you know of trapped pets, share locations. #AnimalRescue #TurkeyQuake
ALERT: More cold weather and possible snow in earthquake zone. Survivors in the open at risk of hypothermia. Urgent need for heating and shelter. #WeatherAlert #Turkey
Started GoFundMe for Turkey-Syria earthquake victims. Already raised $50K. Every dollar helps. Link in bio. Please share widely! üôè #DonateNow #EarthquakeRelief
Reporting from Hatay province. Entire towns wiped off the map. Official death toll doesn't capture the scale. Thousands still missing. #Journalism #TurkeyDisaster
Regime blocking aid to opposition areas in Syria. Politics over people's lives even during disasters. International pressure needed NOW. #SyriaAid #StopTheBlockade
Critical infrastructure damaged. Water, electricity, gas lines broken. Risk of disease outbreak. Sanitation urgent priority in affected areas. #PublicHealth #Infrastructure
I was pulled out after 40 hours. My neighbors saved me by digging. My mother and sister still inside. Please don't stop looking. Building: √ái√ßek apartments, Antakya. #StillHope
Firefighters from 15 provinces working together. Saw things I'll never forget. But also saw humanity at its best. Keep supporting rescue efforts. #FirefighterHeroes #Turkey
NGO convoys struggling to reach remote villages. Roads destroyed. Some areas haven't seen any help. Using helicopters where possible. #RuralAreas #AccessDenied
Built website to match volunteers with needs: depremyardim.com. Real-time updates on what's needed where. Tech community mobilizing! #TechForGood #deprem
My 6 month old baby survived 50 hours under rubble with me. Miracle baby they're calling her. Thank you to the heroes who saved us. #Survivor #GaziantepMiracle
Driving back and forth non-stop. So many injured. Hospitals overflowing. Setting up field hospitals. Need more ambulances and paramedics. #Emergency #MedicalHelp
We're overwhelmed. Mass burials necessary. Families waiting hours to bury loved ones. This is the hardest thing I've ever done. May they all rest in peace. #Grief #Turkey
Massive tent cities forming. Thousands living in freezing conditions. Children sick, elderly suffering. Need heaters, medical support, food supplies. #TentCity #Refugees
Mental health crisis unfolding. Everyone traumatized. Children can't sleep, adults in shock. Need trauma counselors urgently. #MentalHealth #PTSD
Working to restore electricity. Dangerous conditions. Some areas may take weeks. Prioritizing hospitals and shelters. #PowerOutage #Infrastructure
Mosque survived, now shelter for 300 people. Providing meals and prayer space. Unity in crisis. All faiths welcome. #FaithAndHope #CommunitySupport
Opened all rooms for free to displaced families. Other hotels please do same. We must help each other. #Solidarity #FreeAccommodation
Water trucks delivering to affected areas. Boil all water before drinking. Cholera risk high. Distribution points at city centers. #WaterCrisis #HealthAlert
Found a 4 year old boy wandering alone in Antakya. Can't find his parents. He says his name is Yusuf. Anyone recognize him? At central rescue point. #LostChild #FindFamily
Using drones to survey damage and find survivors. Thermal imaging detecting people under rubble. Technology saving lives. #DroneRescue #Technology
Baking bread 24/7 for survivors and rescue workers. Free for all. Other businesses join us - give what you can. #CommunityEffort #FreeBread
University cancelled classes. All students volunteering. Sorting donations, packing supplies, helping wherever needed. Youth of Turkey standing strong! #StudentVolunteers
8 months pregnant and rescued after 36 hours. Baby is okay! Medical team amazing. To other pregnant survivors - there is hope! #PregnantSurvivor #Miracle
Turkish military mobilized. Setting up field hospitals, clearing roads, airlifting supplies. We will not abandon our people. #TurkishArmy #Relief
Turkish diaspora worldwide mobilizing. Sending money, supplies, expertise. We're coming home to help. Turkey is strong! #TurkishDiaspora #Unity
Please help identify bodies. Bringing photos to morgue. Need DNA samples from families. Heartbreaking but necessary. #Identification #Morgue
Bringing generators to hospitals and shelters. Fuel supply critical. Companies please donate fuel. #Power #Generators
Rescued 87 year old woman after 92 hours! She was singing to stay conscious. Incredible will to live. #ElderlyHero #NeverGiveUp
So many children orphaned. Setting up emergency care centers. Need toys, clothes, counselors, love. #Orphans #ChildCare
Coordinating supply chains. Need organization not just donations. Specific requests: baby food, insulin, dialysis supplies, wheelchairs. #Logistics #OrganizedRelief
Mobile networks overloaded but functioning. Use SMS to preserve bandwidth. WhatsApp working better than calls. #Communication #Network
Assessing buildings for safety. Red tag = unsafe, yellow = restricted, green = safe. Do not ignore tags. Aftershocks still happening. #BuildingSafety #Assessment
We survived Assad, ISIS, bombs, and now earthquake. Syrian people are the strongest. But we need world's help now more than ever. #SyrianResilience
Free medication for earthquake victims. Prescriptions not required in emergency. Restocking daily. Other pharmacies please join. #FreeMedicine #Healthcare
Our search dogs found 12 survivors today. These heroes work tirelessly. Need more canine teams if available. #RescueDogs #Heroes
Aid arriving from 80+ countries. UN coordinating. Customs fast-tracked. This is global solidarity in action. #InternationalAid #GlobalResponse
Satellite imagery shows 10,000+ collapsed buildings. Full extent of damage still emerging. #SatelliteData #DamageAssessment
Collected 5,000 blankets in 24 hours! Keep them coming. People sleeping outside in -5¬∞C. #BlanketDrive #WarmthNeeded
Gas lines ruptured in many areas. DO NOT light fires or smoke near damaged buildings. Explosion risk high. #GasLeak #SafetyWarning
Strong aftershock 6.4 magnitude just hit Hatay. More building collapses. Rescue teams taking cover. Stay clear of damaged structures! #Aftershock #NewDanger
Blood banks running low. Type A and O especially needed. Donation centers open extended hours. One donation saves 3 lives. #BloodDonation #SaveLives
Heavy machinery arriving from across Turkey. Cranes, excavators, bulldozers. Carefully removing debris. Precision work to avoid harming survivors. #HeavyEquipment
Diabetic and need insulin. Pharmacies destroyed in my area (Hatay-Defne). Running out. Please help if you know where to get supplies! #DiabetesHelp #Insulin
Our school became emergency shelter. 400 people here. Teachers now relief coordinators. This is education in crisis. #SchoolShelter #Teachers
Interpreting between Syrian refugees and Turkish rescue teams. Language barrier slowing rescues. More bilingual volunteers needed! #Translation #LanguageHelp
Worried about COVID spread in crowded shelters. Limited masks and sanitizer. Disease control teams needed urgently. #PublicHealth #COVID
Ham radio operators maintaining communications where cell towers down. Network of volunteers relaying messages. #HamRadio #EmergencyComms
Lost my leg in building collapse. Anyone know where prosthetics available? Want to walk again and help others. #Prosthetics #Disability
Conducted 50 funeral prayers today. Each one hurts. May Allah give patience to families. #Funerals #Grief
Rescued twin babies from rubble, parents didn't make it. Looking for family members to take care of them. Anyone know Al-Hassan family from Jandaris? #Orphans #Syria
Geologist here: This was on East Anatolian Fault. Expect aftershocks for months. Magnitude 5+ possible. Buildings already damaged at high risk. #Seismology #AftershockWarning
Driving bus loads of people to safe cities. Free transport. Meeting point at stadium. Will keep running until everyone who wants to leave can leave. #Evacuation #FreeTransport
Organizing benefit concert for earthquake victims. All proceeds to relief. Musicians unite for Turkey and Syria! Details soon. #BenefitConcert #ArtistsUnite
Paralyzed in collapse. Lost my wheelchair in rubble. Can't move without it. Anyone have spare wheelchair in Gaziantep area? #Wheelchair #DisabilityAid
Factory shut down, converting to relief center. All employees now volunteers. Making and distributing food. #FactoryRelief #CommunitySupport
Woman gave birth under rubble. Mother and baby both survived and rescued. Named her Nadia - Hope. #BirthMiracle #Hope
Cemetery at capacity. Opening new burial grounds. This is beyond anything we prepared for. #Cemetery #Burials
REUNITED with my son after 4 days! We thought we lost each other. Prayers answered. Never lose hope! #Reunion #Miracle
Sensors detected movement but was shifting rubble not survivor. Crushing disappointment but teams keep searching. #RescueOperations #KeepHope
